dmca.title: bigdealtv.com-Sony Television Letter to ISP (02 14 06)
dmca.body:
_____  

From: Jayme [mailto:jayme@netenforcers.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, April 18, 2006 11:11 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; abuse@theplanet.com
Cc: 'Jayme'
Subject: bigdealtv.com-Sony Television Letter to ISP (02 14 06)



 

April 18, 2006


SENT VIA Certified Mail
  Return Receipt Requested

7006 0100 0002 0690 0809

 

 

Designated Agent

Theplanet.com

 

 

Re:      Unauthorized Use of Sony Trademarks and/or Copyrighted Materials 

 

Dear Designated Agent:

            

We have been retained by our client, Net Enforcers, Inc., to contact you
with respect to unauthorized use of Sony
